p: Plasma lipids with total cholesterol (TC), triglycerides (TG), high-density lipoproteins (HDL-C), and low-density lipoproteins (LDL-C) were analyzed using enzymatic assay kits (Roche Diagnostics GmbH, Mannheim, Germany), as per manufacturerâ€™s protocols, using the Clinical Chemistry Autoanalyser, Roche/Hitachi 902 (Roche Diagnostics, F. Hoffmann-La Roche Ltd., Basel, Switzerland).
